author: Simon Difford
description: With vitamin loaded tomato and lemon juices, this sugar-free, low-calorie Mary is almost a healthy option.Be sure to use a tomato juice with no added sugar and be aware that adding Worcestershire sauce will also contribute a very small amount of sugar.
name: Bloody Mary (no added sugar & low-calorie)

recipeInstructions.text: ROLL (rotate) all ingredients with ice in shaker (rather than shake) and strain into ice-filled glass
Use ice freshly from freezer to fill glass (not ice directly from ice-machine) to avoid unwanted dilution from melting ice
